title: Strengthening Practical Curriculum Development Competencies: Indoor Design Practical Training Course Integrating Social Responsibility

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Theories of Interior Design and Practical Experience, Understanding of Social Responsibility Concepts
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social problem-solving cases to develop indoor design plans incorporating elements of social responsibility.
Learners can propose design solutions reflecting cultural sensitivity based on collaborative experiences with local community stakeholders.
Learners can apply social impact assessment criteria using case study materials provided through mobile platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
